description:
In this short course I teach you the basics of using Camtasia Studio to produce good quality multimedia recordings right out of the gates without any prior knowledge or experience.
The course is taught in laymans terms without the use of any technical jargon consisting of 19 short, easy to understand videos.
This course will eliminate the usual fear and reservations usually associated with taking on a task such as this by providing the necessary knowledge and skills needed without overwhelming you with unnecessary technical skills and terms.
For someone just getting into video production, this course will give you a much needed short cut to understanding the software and to success.
title: Camtasia - The essentials - All you need to know
